title: The Red Fez
description: In 1936 Algiers, a valuable artifact goes missing from a French archeological site and seemingly nobody knows where it has gone. Pierre Rensard, Chief of Police, is suddenly charged with recouping the item in a realm of moral ambiguity where everyone feels entitled to the ill-gotten gains. Enter the usual - Savid, propreitor of THE local underground gambling establishment - Sylvia Longshot, gun trader & supposed husband-murderer - Afiz, Sylvia's crooked - literally! â€“ lover - Habibi, the most cunning of the career criminals in Algiers With France breathing down his neck, choking off the borders and sending troops to 'aid' him in his investigation, Pierre has as little time to sort this thing out as the prime suspect has to sell it. And all this is just before the entire city becomes swamped with crates of grapefruit... A Fully Illustrated Novella
author: Leopold McGinnis
